drag_drop_description: Drag and drop a folder or choose one below to begin.
table_empty_state: No supported audio files found in the folder.
settings_description: Set your default archive size, format, output path, and ignore rules.
settings_output_directory_hint: Leave blank to export next to the input folder.
settings_auto_split_hint: Split lossless multichannel stems into mono when they exceed the target size.
settings_ignore_enabled_hint: Skip matching files during scanning and packing.
settings_ignore_patterns_hint: One pattern per line, evaluated relative to the selected folder.
metadata_section_description: Populate PACK-METADATA.json and INFO.txt with these fields.
toast_archive_estimate_split: Estimated archives — ZIP: {zipCount}, 7z volumes: {sevenZipCount}. Mono splits: {splitCount}.
toast_archive_estimate_ignored: Estimated archives — ZIP: {zipCount}, 7z volumes: {sevenZipCount}. Ignored {ignoredCount} files.
toast_archive_estimate_split_ignored: Estimated archives — ZIP: {zipCount}, 7z volumes: {sevenZipCount}. Mono splits: {splitCount}. Ignored {ignoredCount} files.
toast_zip_mono_split_warning: ZIP mono split unavailable for {count} file(s). Consider switching to 7z volumes.
dialog_overwrite_message_zip: Found {count} StemPacker ZIP archives in {directory}. Overwrite them?
dialog_overwrite_message_7z: Found a StemPacker 7z volume set in {directory}. Overwrite it?
dialog_multichannel_message: Found {count} multichannel file(s) over the target size. What should we do?
toast_scan_failed: Scanning failed. Check the folder and try again.
toast_overwrite_failed: Could not remove existing StemPacker outputs.
toast_scan_no_audio: No supported audio files were found in the selected folder.
toast_scan_no_audio_with_ignored: No supported audio files were found. Ignored {ignoredCount} item(s).
toast_packing_failed: Packing failed. Please review the logs and try again.
toast_packing_unavailable: Select a folder with stems before starting the pack job.
toast_packing_cancel_failed: Could not cancel the active packing job.
warning_zip_mono_split_title: Some files exceed the ZIP mono split limit
warning_zip_mono_split_description: These multichannel files cannot be split into mono tracks within the current size cap. Switch to 7z volumes or raise the target size.
warning_zip_mono_split_list_label: Files that exceed the per-channel ZIP limit
about_description: StemPacker bundles audio stems into size-capped archives for easy delivery.
about_links: Visit stempacker.app for documentation and updates.
